descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: LeBron James shows that he's feeling it as he knocks down four 3-pointers in the first half against the Pistons.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (LeBron feels it from deep in the 1st half) 2021/01/28 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: LeBron feels it from deep in the 1st half

videos.description: Mason Plumlee goes up for an easy layup and gets hooked across the neck by Kentavious Caldwell-Pope, who is called for a flagrant foul.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KCP hooks Plumlee for flagrant foul) 2021/01/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: KCP hooks Plumlee for flagrant foul

videos.description: Blake Griffin relishes the moment and has himself a nice chuckle as LeBron James gets called for a foul while guarding him.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Griffin laughs as he sells foul on LeBron) 2021/01/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Griffin laughs as he sells foul on LeBron
